mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT board_index,member_id, board_pwd, board_type, board_subject, board_content, board_img, board_readCnt, board_ref, board_ref_step, board_ref_level, board_reg_date, board_ip, rownum rNum ROM ( SELECT * FROM board_tbl ORDER BY board_ref DESC, board_ref_step ASC ) ) WHERE rNum >= #{start} AND rNum <= #{end}
